title: Private

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Outpost (Night, 3 use): Choose a target. You will deal a Powerful attack to all non-Unseen players that visit your target.
- Cage the Elephant (Night): Choose a target. If their visit was Astral, you will deal a Powerful attack to them. Otherwise, you will roleblock them.

desc:
Post 1083
*You know... nobody will find out if I break my strict drug-free oath if I keep it private.*
